weapons.description: A massive sword with immense raw power. Suitable for those who prefer strength over speed.
A sleek, sharp blade with quick, fluid attacks. Perfect for a balance of speed and power.
A versatile weapon that offers a balance of offense and defense. Ideal for beginners.
Rapid, relentless attacks with dual blades. Best for hunters who prefer agility and speed.
A heavy weapon capable of delivering powerful blows. Ideal for stunning monsters.
A musical weapon that supports allies with melodies. Great for team-oriented hunters.

weapons.name: Iron Lance
weapons.description: A long-reaching weapon with a strong defense. Perfect for a methodical and defensive playstyle.

weapons.name: Iron Gunlance
weapons.description: Combines the lance's defense with explosive firepower. Ideal for those who like to mix melee and ranged attacks.

weapons.name: Iron Axe
weapons.description: A versatile weapon that can switch between axe and sword modes. Great for dynamic combat.
A complex weapon that transforms between a sword & shield and an axe. Ideal for strategic hunters.
A nimble weapon that allows for aerial attacks. Includes a Kinsect to extract essences from monsters.
A ranged weapon that offers flexibility and precision. Suitable for hunters who prefer to strike from a distance.
A rapid-fire ranged weapon. Perfect for mobile and agile combat.
A powerful ranged weapon with high damage output. Best for hunters who prefer heavy firepower.
